name: KEEP IT AWAY (ETHER X GAMES, MA2022, Cyberware Games)
name_original: KEEP IT AWAY (ETHER X GAMES, MA2022, Cyberware Games)
description:
You are a father shooting at incoming waves of monsters to keep your family safe. Upgrade your weapon and kill all the monsters!

Instructions:

Aim: Mouse curser

Shoot: Left mouse button

Move: A & D or Left & Right arrow keys

Jump: Space bar

Pause / Buy upgrades: B
